text.0: agni quick sage infallible allknowing i choose to be our priest at this oblation.
text.1: in our gods service he best skilled shall worship may he obtain us boons for strength and riches.
text.2: agni to thee i lift the oilfed ladle bright with an offering bearing our oblation.
text.3: from the right hand choosing the gods attendance he with rich presents hath arranged the worship.
text.4: of keenest spirit is the man thou aidest give us good offspring thou who givest freely.
text.5: in power of wealth most rich in men o agni of thee the good may we sing forth fair praises.
text.6: men as they worship thee the god o agni have set on thee full many a brilliant aspect.
text.7: so bring most youthful one the gods assembly the heavenly host which thou today shalt honour.
text.8: when gods anoint thee priest at their oblation and seat thee for thy task as sacrificer.
text.9: o agni be thou here our kind defender and to ourselves vouchsafe the gift of glory.
